backend/main.mo: Core Motoko actor for the CyberGenesis Land Mint DApp implementing land registry, NFT minting, token claiming, upgrades, loot caches, and modifiers with access control and inter-canister calls.
CANISTER_REINSTALL_GUIDE.md: Step-by-step guide for force-reinstalling the Land and Asset Canisters on ICP mainnet, listing all five canister IDs and the authorized admin principal.
DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Pre-deployment checklist for CyberGenesis covering environment configuration and frontend .env setup.
DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Mainnet deployment guide for the CyberGenesis DApp covering prerequisites, canister creation sequence, and asset requirements for all five canisters.
DEPLOYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Critical environment configuration and ordered deployment instructions for all five CyberGenesis canisters.
DEVELOPER_README.md: Developer documentation describing the five-canister ICP architecture (Land, Token, Marketplace, Governance, Asset) and inter-canister communication for the CyberGenesis NFT land DApp.
ENVIRONMENT_CONFIGURATION.md: Reference guide listing all required environment variables for the frontend .env file, including network and canister ID configuration.
ENVIRONMENT_SETUP.md: Setup guide for resolving asset canister and availability errors by configuring environment variables and deploying backend canisters locally or on mainnet.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report JSON documenting implemented features with file targets, component dependencies, and detailed descriptions such as the FBM nebula shader replacement in CubeVisualization.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file describing their purpose, styling approach, and key implementation details.
frontend/.env: Production environment variables file permanently targeting ICP mainnet with all five canister IDs, admin principal, gateway failover configuration, and retry/timeout settings.
frontend/.env.example: Template environment variables file with placeholder canister IDs, network settings, retry configuration, and examples for both local and mainnet deployments.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the CyberGenesis Vite/React app with cache-control meta tags and a root div mounting the main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that orchestrates authentication state, actor initialization, and routing between LandingPage, Dashboard, and ProfileSetup based on identity and user profile status. Also handles actor reinitialization progress display.
frontend/src/asset-backend.d.ts: TypeScript type declarations for the asset backend canister interface, defining Asset, UserProfile, UserRole types and the full assetBackendInterface with all callable methods.
frontend/src/asset-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory definition for the asset backend canister, describing all service methods including asset management, user profiles, access control, and admin functions.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory for the main land/game backend canister, defining types like LandData, ClaimResult, LootCache, Modifier, and all service methods for land management, rewards, and governance.
frontend/src/components/AdminGLBUpload.t: Admin-only React component for uploading GLB 3D model files to the asset canister, with authorization checks against a hardcoded admin principal, health checks, drag-and-drop support, and per-file upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel component providing a collapsible UI for uploading GLB land models to the asset canister, with periodic health checks, land type selection, file validation, and simulated upload progress.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterDia: Diagnostic panel component that runs a suite of tests against the asset canister (actor init, network, auth, queries, permissions, cycle balance, GLB inventory, inter-canister comms) and displays results with logs.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterRei: A React component that provides a UI for reinitializing the Asset Canister, including authorization checks, pre/post health checks, and step-by-step progress tracking with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/CanisterDiagnost: A React component that runs connectivity health checks against multiple IC gateways for the Land and Asset canisters, displaying results, response times, and recommendations with optional auto-refresh.
frontend/src/components/CanisterIDVerifi: A React component that compares expected canister IDs against environment variable values for all project canisters, visually indicating which IDs are correctly configured.
A React component that validates required environment variables at runtime and renders a prominent error banner with a quick-fix guide if any critical variables are missing.
frontend/src/components/CosmicBackground: A React component that renders an animated 2D canvas background featuring a twinkling star field and pulsing nebula effects using a cyberpunk color palette.
frontend/src/components/CubeVisualizatio: React Three Fiber component that renders a 3D biome visualization with selective bloom post-processing, an FBM shader background, and camera-synced lighting, mapping biome names to remote GLB model URLs.
frontend/src/components/CyberCube.tsx: Empty placeholder file; all 3D rendering logic has been moved to LandModel.tsx.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentVerifi: UI component that periodically polls LandCanister and AssetCanister health, displays their status with icons/badges, and allows manual refresh with query invalidation.
frontend/src/components/Discovery.tsx: Component for discovering and processing loot caches on a player's land, handling tier-based CBR token and cycle-charge costs with result feedback via toasts.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React class-based error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays a styled error overlay with the error message.
frontend/src/components/Governance.tsx: Governance UI component supporting token staking, proposal creation, and voting on active proposals, with form validation and toast notifications for each action.
frontend/src/components/LandDashboard.ts: Dashboard component for a selected land plot that displays token balance, manages claim-reward cooldown timers, and supports plot upgrades, modifier application, and admin debug actions.
frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx: Loads and renders a GLTF 3D land model with KTX2 texture support, applying biome-specific PBR material settings (emissive intensity, env map intensity, anisotropic filtering) and auto-fitting the camera to the model bounds.
frontend/src/components/LandSelector.tsx: A UI card component that lets users navigate between their owned land plots using previous/next buttons, displaying the current land's name, biome (in Russian), and position in the list.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays a top-10 leaderboard of lands ranked by token balance, fetched via a query hook, with gold/silver/bronze styling for the top three entries.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Renders an interactive 2D map using Maptalks.js (loaded via CDN) showing all land plots as neon-colored UIMarkers on a custom game-world image, highlighting the current user's owned lands.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: A marketplace UI for browsing, buying, listing, and cancelling listings of land plots and modifier items, with filtering by type and price range and toast notifications for transaction results.
frontend/src/components/NetworkDiagnosti: A network health monitor component that periodically pings the asset canister to measure latency and connectivity status, displaying connected/disconnected/checking states with uptime and failure tracking.
frontend/src/components/ParticleBackgrou: Renders an animated 2D canvas background with 60 floating particles that draw connecting lines when within 150px of each other, using requestAnimationFrame for the animation loop.
frontend/src/components/PlotCustomizatio: UI card component that allows users to update the name (max 20 chars) and decoration URL of a selected land plot via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/PlugWalletButton: Button component for connecting/disconnecting a Plug Wallet; shows a dropdown with copy principal and disconnect options when connected, or a connect button when not.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form card that prompts new users to enter their name and saves it as a user profile via the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/Reinitialization: Full-screen overlay component that displays reconnection progress, showing current attempt number, active gateway, and an animated progress bar during ICP network reinitialization.
frontend/src/components/ThreeErrorBounda: React class-based error boundary that catches 3D rendering errors, logs them, and renders a fallback UI with a retry button instead of crashing the canvas.
frontend/src/config/mainnet.ts: Defines and exports mainnet configuration for the ICP deployment, including canister IDs, asset URL helpers, Internet Identity/Plug Wallet settings, and utility functions to initialize, validate, and retrieve model URLs.
React context provider for Plug Wallet integration on ICP, exposing connection state, connect/disconnect methods, and actor creation via the Plug browser extension.
frontend/src/data/modifierCatalog.ts: Static catalog of 45+ placeholder NFT modifiers organized into four rarity tiers (Common, Rare, Legendary, and a fourth tier), intended to be replaced with backend data.
frontend/src/governance-backend.d.ts: TypeScript type declarations for the governance canister backend, defining interfaces for Proposals, Votes, and result variants for staking and voting operations.
frontend/src/governance-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory for the governance backend canister, describing the service interface including staking, proposal creation, and voting methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReinitializer: React hook that manages automatic actor reinitialization by cycling through multiple ICP gateways with up to 3 retry attempts and progressive delays, showing toast notifications on success or failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithInit.ts: React hook that wraps useActor with an initialization polling mechanism, validating backend connectivity by running up to 4 health-check queries with progressive backoff before marking the actor as ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetActor.ts: React hook that initializes and returns an ICP Asset Canister actor with retry logic, multi-gateway failover, environment validation, and health checks. Supports both local and IC network configurations with up to 25 retry attempts.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetHealth.ts: React hook that checks the health of the Asset Canister by fetching its /health endpoint after a 1-second delay, returning a status of 'checking', 'healthy', or 'error'.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetUpload.ts: React hook for uploading GLB files to the Asset Canister using the Plug wallet agent, tracking upload progress and returning success/error results via the uploadLandModel canister method.
frontend/src/hooks/useGovernanceActor.ts: React hook that initializes an ICP Governance Canister actor with retry logic and multi-gateway failover, using the authenticated Internet Identity and supporting both local and IC network environments.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status with delegation validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceActor.t: React hook that initializes an ICP Marketplace Canister actor with retry logic and multi-gateway failover, using the authenticated Internet Identity and supporting both local and IC network environments.
Provides React Query mutation hooks for interacting with token, marketplace, and governance canisters via Plug Wallet, including buy/list/cancel listing and stake/vote operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating land data, user profiles, token balances, and placeholder governance/marketplace operations using Internet Identity actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenActor.ts: Creates and manages an ICP token canister actor with retry logic, gateway failover, and optional Internet Identity authentication, exposing the actor and loading state.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining a cyberpunk dark theme with Tailwind CSS, custom CSS variables, glassmorphism effects, neon glow utilities, and Orbitron/JetBrains Mono fonts.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Exports build timestamp and version metadata for cache-busting and deployment verification, with a utility to append version query parameters to URLs.
frontend/src/lib/debugConfig.ts: Provides conditional debug logging utilities for 3D scene diagnostics, including GPU context inspection, overlapping renderer detection, and performance monitoring, activated via env vars or query params.
frontend/src/lib/tokenUtils.ts: Utility functions for ICRC-1 CBR token amount handling, including formatting raw bigint balances to decimal strings, parsing decimal strings to raw units, adding thousands separators, and checking sufficient balance.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.d.ts: TypeScript type declarations for the marketplace backend canister, defining Listing, ItemType, BuyResult types and the marketplaceBackendInterface with listing, buying, and querying methods.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory definition for the marketplace backend canister, describing the service interface with item listing, buying, cancellation, and query methods.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Page component that displays the full modifier catalog with rarity tiers (Common, Rare, Legendary, Mythic), showing counts per tier and a grid of modifier cards with tier-based styling.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page that fetches user land data and renders tabbed navigation across Land, Discovery, Collection, Leaderboard, Marketplace, Governance, and Map views with a land selector for multiple parcels.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with cosmic/particle backgrounds that prompts unauthenticated users to connect via Internet Identity, showing login state feedback and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/MintingPage.tsx: Transitional minting page that shows a loading spinner while land data initializes, then displays a success message before redirecting to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationPage.tsx: Utility page that renders the CanisterIDVerification component against a cosmic background to verify all canister IDs are correctly configured.
frontend/src/token-backend.d.ts: TypeScript type declarations for the ICRC-1 token backend canister, defining Account, TransferArgs, TransferResult, MetadataValue types and the full tokenBackendInterface including balance, transfer, minting, and admin methods.
frontend/src/token-backend.idl.ts: Defines the Candid IDL factory for an ICRC-1 token canister, declaring types and service methods for balance queries, transfers, metadata, total supply, and minting.
frontend/src/types/webgpu.d.ts: TypeScript ambient type declarations for the WebGPU API, covering GPU, GPUAdapter, GPUDevice, GPUQueue, and related interfaces to enable WebGPU support detection without type errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with helpers for persisting values to sessionStorage and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, neon box shadows, border radii, accordion keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite build configuration for the React frontend, setting up environment variable injection, path aliases, a dev proxy to the local ICP replica, COOP/COEP headers for SharedArrayBuffer, and timestamped output chunks with manual vendor splitting.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state including a summary of the 3D CubeVisualization component work, architectural notes about the FBM-based nebula shader, known deployment issues, and a record of existing features.
README_RUSSIAN.md: Russian-language quick-start deployment guide for CyberGenesis covering prerequisites and dependency installation.
scripts/upload_assets_mainnet.sh: Bash script that uploads all .glb 3D model files from a local assets directory to an ICP mainnet AssetCanister using dfx, with rate limiting and a final verification step.
scripts/upload_assets.sh: Bash script that batch-uploads 48 tiered GLB 3D model files to an ICP AssetCanister using dfx, then verifies the uploads and prints sample asset URLs.
unknown.txt: Partial documentation snippet referencing a step to test a health endpoint.
